title: CD3215C00 can't they be swapped between boards
message:
Hi,

Simple question... if we need to replace a CD3215C00 from any board model, can you use another board model chip or are the chips programmed for a specific model?
Thanks!

title: CD3215C00 can't they be swapped between boards
message: The last 3 letters must match, so yours has C00 firmware.
